column4: Can you have multiple drives mounting a single point in fstab? e.g UUID=x       /mnt/usb_backup ext3    user,noauto     0       0\n UUID=y       /mnt/usb_backup ext3    user,noauto     0       0,
Obviously there would be a conflict if both are plugged in at once, but I am not fussed
what about looking into LVM then?
